a 15336 19808    0  +  70  =  70
a 19808 26308    70  +  90000  =  90070
a 18267 18899    90070  +  10  =  90080
a 18899 19540    90080  +  10  =  90090
a 19540 26305    90090  +  90000  =  180090
a 18525 19165    180090  +  10  =  180100
a 19165 19797    180100  +  10  =  180110
a 19797 26307    180110  +  90000  =  270110
